columns.Poker_Player_ID: A unique identifier assigned to each poker player in the table.
columns.People_ID: A reference to the unique identifier of the person associated with the poker player.
columns.Final_Table_Made: The number of times the player has reached the final table in poker tournaments.
columns.Best_Finish: The best ranking position the player has achieved in a tournament.
columns.Money_Rank: The player's ranking based on their total earnings compared to other players.
columns.Earnings: The total monetary earnings the player has received from their tournament participation.

poker_player.table_description: The poker_player table contains detailed information about individual poker players, tracking their performance, rankings, and earnings in tournaments.

columns.People_ID: A unique identifier assigned to each person in the database.
columns.Nationality: The country representing the nationality of the person.
columns.Name: The full name of the individual.
columns.Birth_Date: The date when the individual was born.
columns.Height: The height of the person, typically measured in centimeters.

people.table_description: The 'people' table contains essential information about individuals, including their unique identifier, nationality, name, date of birth, and height, primarily used for identifying and profiling poker players.
